== Main Inclusion Report for xdg-user-dirs ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/x/xdg-user-dirs/; available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** We want to use if for the gutsy desktop
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=gnome+mount|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=gnome+mount|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid, only runs in the user's session.
** Does not open any port.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions higher than priority 'normal'.
** Not available in debian yet
** No important upstream bug (https://bugs.freedesktop.org/buglist.cgi?product=xdg-user-dirs)
** Upstream is active and the software is used in the new fedora 7 version
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard cdbs packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** Only libc6
